mapper.insert: insert into redList (adminNo, workNo, reason, created) values (#{adminNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into redList
adminNo,
workNo,
reason,
created,
